pages.text: As it turns out, the effects of $(l:effects/decay)Natural Decay$() extend to the $(thing)nether$() in a way: When the $(aura) levels are low enough, $(item)netherrack$() and other blocks will start to $(thing)decay$() as well. First, they will transform into $(item)soul soil$(), then into $(item)soul sand$(), inevitably making the area truly hard to traverse. Additionally, blocks will also start to $(thing)ignite$() seemingly at random.
